title: First rank after placement?
body: what's the highest rank I can get? This is my first time league and base on some stats website I'm silver 1. Is it true or wrong.

replies.body:
You will definitely get Silver something. Even if you go 2-8, you will still get silver.

BUT BUT BUT. Do not do placements this season. WAIT until next year. 
If you do it this year, you get silver. Next year, you WILL get bronze. You always drop, so just save your freebie for next year.

I have heard of some really high rank players start above silver. But I think you would need to be playing diamonds in normals consistently, Idk for sure.
Thanks for the info. I'll keep that in mind but I heard from my friend that I'll get reward so I may try it this season.

Your "reward" is a silver border. SO your teammates will know you ere silver last year, looking up your account online will show silver. 

If that is worth having to start a climb from Bronze4, then ok you do you.
Wow only silver boarder????? Man that sucks.

Oh so the API websites are not accurate? Dang. I might be place in bronze then.

Mathew thanks for the gl hopefully I'll get silver 3 after placement.
Generally first time placements get put in like silver 4-2
silver, is usually the highest first time goes. good luck climbing
